# NUGGET
[color=#a4885c]Ship Size:[/color] Small
[color=#a4885c]Recommended Crew:[/color] 0
[color=#a4885c]Initial Generator Type:[/color] Plasma
The Nugget is a run-down trashy junk vessel that one would find likely derelict in space. It's favored by goblins, and hoboes alike! This is just a hunk of wood and metal disguised as a kitchen.
